entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of drizzle. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
